• A 2D multiplayer mining game where players dig for ores, upgrade equipment, and build structures.
  • Features real-time multiplayer using MQTT, local save system, and cloud sync via Puter.
  • Mobile-friendly controls with touch D-pad and action buttons.
  • Procedural map generation with ore distribution and depth-based heat mechanics.
  • Includes shop system, inventory management, and admin/host controls.

A browser-based multiplayer mining game with real-time networking, procedural world generation, and extensive upgrade systems. Players can mine resources, trade with others, and build structures while managing fuel and heat. The game features both desktop and mobile controls, local and cloud saves, and admin/host management for multiplayer sessions.
